page.title: 09The Ecology of the Canal.
page.content: The{primary zone}of the canal is water and what lives in it and on it.The {secondary zone}is the tow-path area either side of the water.The{tertiery} {zone}consists of the various{habitat} which can be found on walls,buildings and trees which mark the{boundaries}of zones 1&2. Common animals found in zone 1;Pike,Gudgeon,Chubb,Carp,Tench,Perch, Eel,Roach,Dace,Stickleback,Shrimps,Wat er Boatmen,Frogs,Toads,Newts. Zone 2;Shrews, Voles,Rats.Moorhens,Coots,Mallard Duck,Swans Zone 3;Moths,Sand/Common/Wall Lizards,Smooth &Grass Snakes,Spiders,Insects Each {habitat}has a boundary and each type of zone has its own special animals.
